abilities.name: Lolling About
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack) if Snorlax is your Active Pokémon, you may remove 1 damage counter from Snorlax. Snorlax is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
